title: Interpretation of a dream about rotten wheat according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about rotten wheat in a dream by Ibn Sirini. Many people dream of wheat, as wheat is one of the grains mentioned by God Almighty in his favorite book. Interpretation of a dream about rotten wheat in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The matter varies depending on the social status of the pioneer and the appearance in which he appears in the dream, and through this article we will point out all What is related to Ibn Sirin’s vision of rotten wheat. You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of rotten wheat in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of rotten wheat in a dream by Ibn SirinI have downloadedInterpretation of a dream of rotten wheat in a dream by Ibn SirinMany contradictory interpretations and connections: Seeing rotten wheat in a dream indicates He is preoccupied with trivial, useless things, and this dream is considered a warning to him. Seeing rotten, spoiled wheat in the dreamer’s dream indicates that he is wasting his money on invalid and useless matters. You may also be interested in: Pumpkins in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about wet wheat. Interpretation of a dream about wet wheat indicates connotations of goodness. It is one of the good visions according to the interpretations of dream scholars and translators, as: The interpretation of a dream about wet wheat indicates that the dreamer will be freed from worries and problems, in contrast to the interpretation of a dream about rotten wheat in a dream by Ibn Sirin, which indicates distress and sadness. If the dreamer sees wet wheat grains in a dream, these The vision is a sign of good health and peace of mind that the dreamer enjoys. Whoever sees boiled or wet wheat in a dream, this dream indicates that all the difficulties and worries that burden the dreamer and hinder his life will be shaken. You may be interested: Talking with the dead in a dreamInterpretation of seeing wheat in a dream For a single woman: An unmarried woman can see various dreams in a dream, including wheat in a dream. This vision carries many connotations and signs, such as: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about rotten wheat, for a person, indicates the arrival of someone who does not intend to propose to her, but the engagement will not take place. Seeing wheat in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the imminent arrival of goodness and joy to her, as it indicates Indicates that she will get a prestigious job that she was looking for. If an unmarried girl sees a star in her dream, then this vision is an indication of the imminent fulfillment of her long-awaited dreams and aspirations. You may also be interested in the following: I saw my husband getting married. Seeing wheat in a dream for a married womanWheat from Useful grains, and seeing them in a dream is a favorite vision, and when you see them in a dream, a married woman searches for them. Interpretation of a dream about rotten wheat in a dream by Ibn Sirin Where: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing wheat in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will become pregnant and give birth to a physically and psychologically healthy fetus. Seeing wheat in a dream For a married woman, it indicates the stability of her family, her love life, and her access to a lot of good things and money. If a married woman sees wheat grains in her dream, this vision is an indication that her husband will soon get a prestigious job or will be promoted. You may also be interested in the following: Vision Promise in the

title: Interpretation of seeing a soldier in a dream

preview.html: Soldiers are the chains of the army that protect the country from the evil of the enemy. Since many people see the army in a dream and do not know what the interpretation of this means, we will talk in the following lines about the interpretation of seeing a soldier in a dream. We also explain it to you in relation to the interpretation of senior scholars, and this is specific to men in general or married people and single women. So, you should follow this article to find out more details. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a soldier in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a soldier in a dream. A soldier or soldier in a dream shows strength and ambition to achieve the goal, and this has many connotations, including: If a man is seen wearing military clothing and standing in front of his house This is evidence that he protects family members or that he is the only one responsible for that, and this person could be a father or an older brother. If a person sees in a dream that he is applying to a military college and is accepted and appointed to it, then this is evidence of taking responsibility and not trusting others, as well as Excellence in self-confidence. When the dreamer sees that he is standing up to fight the enemy and is victorious, this is an indication of the great status that the dreamer will achieve. If you see an unknown person wearing military clothing or an army man defending you, this means that this person will help you achieve something you want or that he will It will protect you from an enemy who is trying to harm you. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from the army. The interpretation of seeing the army differs from escaping from the army because it has different other meanings, such as: As for whoever sees himself escaping from the army, this is a sign of committing an illegal act that will make you evade legal responsibility. Escaping from the army indicates fear of something that may lead you to prison. When a person sees that he is running away from soldiers and immediately catches up with him, this is a sign of giving up on a certain thing and not being able to do so. Penguin in a dream Seeing a soldier killed in a dream The killing of military personnel varies depending on Whether the victim is from the same country or another country, so you should read the following to find out the appropriate interpretation for you: Whoever sees that he is killing an Egyptian soldier, this is an indication that this person seeks to sabotage the country and spread corruption, or that he is joining ISIS and other groups. If He saw that he is fighting to fight the Israeli soldier or soldier, then this is evidence to him that he is fighting enemies and striving hard and diligently to achieve his goal, and he will eventually reach his goal. When one sees that all the soldiers in the country have been killed, this is an indication that something will happen in that country, Such as revolutions and wars, and we will be defeated in that war. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing the army in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of this vision for an unmarried woman as evidence of marriage to a suitable wealthy person and it has some connotations: When an unmarried girl sees the army standing in front of the house to protect her, this indicates That there is a strong person who will protect her from the difficulties she faces and offer her a helping hand. If an unmarried woman sees the army in a dream, this may be a sign that someone is proposing to her, and most likely it is someone who graduated from the military college

title: Interpretation of a dream about my sister talking to her lover in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my sister talking to her lover in a dream. Scientists give different meanings to what we see in our dreams. Therefore, we learn in the following lines about the interpretation of a dream about my sister talking to her lover in a dream..Interpretation of a dream about my sister talking with her lover in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister talking with her lover in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this. However, the interpretation of a dream about seeing a sister in a dream could be a sign of kindness and tenderness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a happy sister in a dream, it may be a sign of happiness, and God knows everything that is not seen. If she sees An unmarried girl, a sad sister, may be a sign of sadness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who killed her husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who killed her husband in a dream. For you, we find specific interpretations for you to see that. But if the husband of one of the husbands of a relative sees himself killed in a dream, this may result in depriving the relatives of His rights, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his husband killed in a dream, this may indicate a calamity that will happen to him, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams of her husband being killed by a stranger, this may mean that her husband has been wronged, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister praying without a veil. In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about my sister praying without a hijab in a dream may be a sign of some problems facing the girl, and God knows all the unseen. If a married woman dreams of a sister praying without a hijab, it may be a sign of judgments, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her sister praying without a hijab, it may express About great misery, and God knows everything that no one saw. If the dreamer sees his sister praying without a veil, this may lead her to some trouble, and God knows everything that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister reconciling with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister reconciling with me in a dream could be a sign of kindness. And God knows best. If a married man sees his sister reconciling with him in a dream, this may indicate goodness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees her sister reconciling, this may lead to happiness, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees her sister’s interests, she can express goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister screaming And crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister. Screaming and crying in a dream. Seeing a sister crying could represent goodness and happiness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the sister crying in a dream, it may be a sign of kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing, while if the dreamer sees the sister crying in a dream, it could be a sign of problems and anxiety, and God knows the unseen. A single girl saw her sister screaming in a dream. This may be evidence of the loss of someone, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about my sister, who photographed me in a dream. Interpretation of my sister’s dream, which depicts me in a dream, could indicate interest in matters that are not serious, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as he may show interest in trivial matters, and God knows the unseen. An unmarried girl saw her sister getting pregnant, this may be evidence of wasting time, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a sister who depicts her in a mysterious image in a dream, this may represent exposure to deception and lies, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a prisoner dying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a prisoner in a dream Today we will learn about all the interpretations and clues that talk about the interpretation of a dream about the death of a prisoner in a dream, so let us get to know all the interpretations and their implications. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a prisoner in a dream If an unmarried girl sees that the prisoner has died, this is a sign of longevity. Age. To dream of a prisoner escaping from his prison and dying is a sign of a good ending. A person who sees in his dream the death of a prisoner in a dream indicates the end of problems and worries. The death of a prisoner in a dream is a sign of good luck. Whoever sees the death of a person is negligent, and weeps over him with a heart. Burning, he knows that anxiety and consolation are calmed. Interpretation of a dream about visiting a prisoner in a dream. Whoever sees a prisoner of one of his relatives visiting him in prison is a sign that the charges against him will be dropped. Dreaming of visiting a prisoner in a dream is a sign that the sentence will be commuted. Whoever sees in his dream that he is visiting a prisoner He does not know him, so it is a sign of the injustice that has befallen this person and he must support him. Visiting the person imprisoned by his friends in a dream is a sign of getting rid of the problems and fears that surrounded this person. Interpretation of a dream about a prisoner leaving his prison in a dream: A married woman seeing her husband outside the prison is a sign of disagreements. And problems in her life. When she sees a prisoner leaving prison, this is a sign of escaping from worries and sorrows. Seeing a brother outside prison in a dream, being chased by dogs, means that there are many enemies and haters around him. Whoever sees in his dream that someone he loves has gone out From prison, this is a sign that he overcame the difficulties and problems that were present in his life. A married man’s escape from prison is a sign of separation from his wife. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the person you love imprisoned in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that there is someone close to him in prison, this is a sign On the psychological pressures he is exposed to. Dreaming of going to prison for the sake of a loved one is a sign of tension and lack of self-confidence. Whoever dreams of a prisoner escaping from prison is a sign of sin. Dreaming of someone you love in a dream going to prison is a sign of difficult circumstances that This person is going through it. A married woman’s dream of her husband going to prison is evidence of the pain and sadness that she feels at that time. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick prisoner in a dream. Seeing a sick prisoner visiting a prisoner is a sign of death. If one sees that he is in prison and that he is very sick, this is a sign of Healing illness. Seeing a sick prisoner in a dream is a sign of anxiety and sadness. Whoever sees that he is visiting a prisoner who is in a serious illness, this is evidence of the mistake he is making, and he must repent and return to God Almighty. Seeing a dead prisoner in a dream Anyone who dreams of placing dead people in Prison is a sign that he will be subjected to torture if he is unfaithful. Dreaming of a dead believer imprisoned in a dream is a sign that he will enter Paradise, God willing. Whoever sees in a dream that a dead person is imprisoned, this is a sign of his need for supplication and charity. Dreaming of a dead person entering prison is a sign of his request for charity. And supplication. Imprisoning a dead person in a dream is a sign of the blessed position he is in. Interpretation

title: Learn about the interpretation of running in a dream for advanced researchers

preview.html: Running in dreams, interpreters say that the dream leads to goodness and carries many positive interpretations, but in some cases it portends evil, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of running for single people, married people, pregnant women, and men, according to Ibn. And Sirin scholars in interpretation. Running in a dream The dream interpretation of running explains that the dreamer is going through some pleasant circumstances in the coming period, and if the dreamer runs while feeling afraid in his dream, it shows the accumulation of responsibilities on him and the feeling of psychological pressure. And his need to relax, and if the dreamer is going through difficulties in his life and dreams that he has good news about getting rid of distress and getting rid of problems in the near future. If the dreamer runs away from a certain thing, then the dream indicates recklessness, lack of responsibility, and neglect of duties, so he must change himself. So that the matter does not reach an undesirable stage, even if the dreamer is planning to start a specific project. In his work and watching running in his dream he has good news of success in this project and earning a lot of money through it. Running in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that running in a dream is a good thing, as it indicates that the visionary has vitality and activity, as he sees things with optimism and positivity and thinks In it a lot, which is reflected in his dreams and thoughts. Running in a dream indicates that the dreamer will soon make a certain decision that he has been postponing for a long time, because his efforts will not be in vain. Running in a dream about Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq believes that a dream about running shows that the dreamer is suffering a lot in his work He earns little money, so he is thinking about leaving his job, and perhaps the dream is a warning to him not to rush this decision. He fights and does everything he can to achieve his goals. If the dreamer is running fast, the dream symbolizes the many skills he possesses, as it shows that he is a successful and determined person who takes responsibility and knows how to combine work and personal life. He feels fear for the future and cannot put it down. Its goals. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the dream interpretation website on the Internet, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Running in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single woman exercising running indicates that she is trying and putting in effort and energy to achieve her dreams as quickly as possible. Important in her life. If the dreamer runs away from something unknown in her dream, this means that she faces many obstacles on her way to success and progress and she must not give up and keep trying until she gets what she wants, and if the dreamer runs away from a man, the dream portends the approaching marriage of her to a handsome young man. She falls in love with him at first sight and fulfills all her dreams. Interpretation of running and escaping in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is running and escaping, her vision indicates that there are many difficult circumstances in which she lives and confirms that she fears the unknown and does not believe people easily. As he pointed out Many jurists have indicated that escaping and escaping in the dream of an unmarried woman

If the dreamer runs away from something unknown in her dream, this means that she faces many obstacles on her way to success and progress and she must not give up and keep trying until she gets what she wants, and if the dreamer runs away from a man, the dream portends the approaching marriage of her to a handsome young man. She falls in love with him at first sight and fulfills all her dreams. Interpretation of running and escaping in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is running and escaping, her vision indicates that there are many difficult circumstances in which she lives and confirms that she fears the unknown and does not believe people easily. As he pointed out Many jurists have indicated that escaping and escaping in the dream of an unmarried woman

An unmarried girl seeing a beautiful carpet in a dream indicates a permanent determination to achieve many desires and ambitions. Seeing an unmarried woman praying on a beautiful carpet in a dream indicates God’s satisfaction with her and her thanks to Him. On the many blessings in her life. A single girl seeing a clean carpet in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy for her. Seeing a single girl buying a carpet in a dream is a sign of a happy marriage and a peaceful life. title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great commentator Ibn Sirin says: If someone dreams in a dream that he is drinking coffee. This dream shows that the people around this dreamer love him very much. It also indicates that this dreamer has many friendships. But if the dreamer sees In his dream, he is drinking coffee with its yolks with another person. This indicates that this dreamer will achieve great benefit from dealing with this other person. If the dreamer sees himself in his dream drinking coffee in a closed place, this dream indicates that this dreamer feels lonely and that others They are not interested in it either. Interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee in a dream for a single girl: If a girl dreams that she is pouring coffee in her dream. This is evidence that this dreaming girl feels anxious and sad and also faces many psychological problems. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is drinking coffee with milk. Where This is evidence that this single girl will marry the man she loves and wants. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is drinking Arabic coffee. This is evidence that this dreaming girl has people who do not love her well, but they do not show it in front of her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream She is drinking boiled coffee. This dream indicates that the dreamer is performing undesirable actions, and it is also forbidden. Therefore, he must hasten to repent and return to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of dreams about drinking coffeeInterpretation of a dream about drinking coffee for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream that she She drinks coffee. This dream indicates that this dreaming girl will receive unpleasant news as soon as possible. This unpleasant news will cause her sadness and pain. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is offering coffee with dates to her husband. This dream indicates that this woman’s husband The dreaming lady will engage in a very important mission. This project will reap many benefits and bring him abundant goodness. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is drinking coffee with a sweet and delicious taste. This dream indicates that this married woman will live her married life happily here as well. Interpretation A pregnant woman dreams of drinking coffee. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is drinking coffee, then this pregnant woman does not know the sex of the fetus. This dream indicates that this pregnant woman will give birth to a boy. But if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that coffee is falling. This dream indicates that this pregnant woman She will give birth to a female, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is drinking black coffee and it has a bitter and unpleasant taste. This dream indicates that the dreamer feels tired as a result of pregnancy and that she needs to rest. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that a cup of coffee falls from her hands. This dream means that her birth will be very difficult and dangerous. Interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee in a dream for a man: If someone sees in his dream that he is drinking coffee with his friends. This dream is a sign that this dreamer’s friends love him and respect the bonds of friendship that exist between them. If a man dreams that he is drinking coffee, then This coffee has a bitter and unpleasant taste

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a completely white veil in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a white veil in a dream. Either remove it or tear it, and as we have attached for you everything related to the dirty veil in a dream, its full meaning is through the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions, and as we have collected for you the interpretation. Of the white veil in a dream, it is complete for adult, married, and pregnant women, but also in men’s dreams. Interpretation of seeing a white veilThe interpretation of seeing a full veil in a dream generally indicates a woman’s good reputation among people and her good and good biography. The dream of wearing a long white veil Everywhere it indicates great improvement and stability in a woman’s life and the achievement of goodness. Also, seeing a black veil in a dream means that there are some problems and difficulties that the dreamer is going through. Also, seeing bright colors on the veil in a dream is full of visions that indicate happiness, pleasures and comfort from... Distress. Seeing a short, completed veil in a dream means that this woman is lagging behind in her duties to save her husband and children and must take care of them. Interpretation of the white veil in a dream is complete for a public woman. Wearing a white veil in a dream is full of public women with good visions that show happiness, pleasure, and a way out of distress. Also, if a girl sees herself in a dream wearing a short, complete veil with her hair visible, this indicates that she has committed sins and great sins. Seeing the white veil in a dream is complete, its shape is beautiful, and it is hidden for the common woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman’s veil? Interpretation of seeing a married woman taking off her veil In a dream, it indicates that she will fall into misfortune because of her wrong actions. Seeing a married woman wearing a completely white veil in a dream means that she will enjoy a good and great living in her next life. Taking off the veil in a dream is full of visions that indicate her big problems that will occur within her, and it is a sign of divorce and obstacles in life. Her life. The interpretation of seeing a woman tearing the veil in a dream is full of dreams that show her distance from God and her deviation from faith and religion and that she needs to repent. What is the interpretation of seeing a white veil for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a white veil in a dream is full of visions that indicate Her goodness and care for the child she desires, whether male or female. Wearing a beautiful and elegant white veil in a dream for a pregnant woman is a good omen and a sign that she will have an easy and trouble-free birth. A veil in a dream is generally considered complete without taking it off, tearing it, or seeing it used in a dream. Desirable, otherwise it is an indication of unpleasant events.If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its implications for single women in detail

preview.html: The tiger is a wild and predatory animal, so seeing it in a dream is considered one of the terrifying visions that causes anxiety and panic to its owner, and today we explain the dream of the tiger to Ibn Sirin with different interpretations for a man. A single married woman and other interpretations, where the dreamer of a tiger searches for an interpretation of everything he sees so that he can know the meaning of the dream and whether his vision is good or not. Watch the interpretation of the dream of seeing a tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a tiger in a dream means strength and courage for the dreamer. But if one sees a tiger trapped in a cage, this indicates the danger that the dreamer may face. If he sees in a dream that a tiger attacked him and did not harm him, this means that he will get rid of worries and problems. But if he is injured by the tiger, this indicates his failure in something. If If one sees a tiger running in front of him, this means that the dreamer will acquire great wealth in a short period of time in the very near future. The scholar Ibn Sirin indicated in his interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream that it is a sign of courage and strength, and an indication of strength and success. As for seeing tigers in Cages in the zoo, this indicates that the person with vision is in danger. As for the vision of drinking tiger milk, it is a sign of hostility towards the dreamer or the main opponent. A dream of escaping from a wild tiger indicates the person’s fear. Also, whoever sees a piece of tiger skin also indicates that the dreamer He will gain a lot of money, in addition to a lot of status, wealth and pride, as well as power. If the dreamer can see a tiger in a dream, this is a sign of failure. But when a person dreams of buying a wild tiger, this indicates that the owner of the vision has owners who have good status and status. Seeing a tiger in addition to seeing a dreamer in a dream causes fear, which indicates an important event that will happen in the dreamer’s life, whether it is the collapse of a marriage or a separation. But when you see a tiger running fast in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will have great wealth. Seeing marriage From a female tiger means that the dreamer will fall under the rule of a corrupt woman who will harm him and manipulate him. A dream of a tiger is for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees a tiger in a dream, this indicates her relationship with a strong but lying young man who will not marry her. If a girl sees that she has got a tiger skin, this means that A rich man will propose marriage to her and offer her a large dowry. If she sees that a tiger is chasing and attacking her, this means that she has many admirers. If she sees that she is playing with the tiger without fear, this means that she will meet the knight of her dreams and marry him. Seeing a tiger skin for an unmarried girl indicates Her dowry. Seeing a tiger attacking a girl in a dream indicates that the dreamer is surrounded by many admirers, but if he sees in a dream that he is playing with a tiger, this is evidence that he will meet a special young man, whom he can marry. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger for a married woman. A married woman’s dream of a tiger is interpreted as a sign of The strength of her husband and that he will have a high status. If a married woman sees a tiger playing in her house, this indicates happiness and stability in the home. If a married woman sees a tiger playing in her home, this indicates happiness and stability in the home.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pears in a dream

preview.html: Dream Interpretation: Seeing pears in a dream Seeing pears in a dream indicates good and happy luck and an increase in livelihood. Seeing pears indicates the cessation of fatigue and pain. Seeing pears in a dream shows a lot of goodness in the dreamer’s life.. Growing in a very cold climate in Turkey occurs everywhere, and the meaning and change of seeing pears in dreams can vary and many people want to know the interpretation of pear dreams. To see good or evil, pears in a dream indicate prosperity, prestigious work, and abundance. Interpretation of a dream about pears by Ibn Sirin: Seeing pears in a dream generally foretells blessings and abundance of money. Seeing pears in a dream means that the dreamer has many benefits and good news if the time is right. This is seeing pears instead of other times, which indicates stress, illness, and severe pain. Ibn Sirin explained the dream of a bear with its various meanings in his dream, and said that whoever saw it would like it to turn bright green, which indicates that he will obtain new job opportunities or have A lot of financial resources. As for whoever sees that he is eating sour pears, it has been shown that he is fine. Seeing the dreamer eating pears, which indicates that the fortuneteller received forbidden money, not his rights. Green and red pears are interpreted in their dreams, which represent goodness, elegance, and happiness. Seeing pears in yellow in a dream means sudden illness and extreme exhaustion. Seeing harvesting pears in a dream means that he will earn a lot of money. Dream of seeing pears in a dream If you see a woman carrying pears in a dream, this means that she will be pregnant and give birth to a man. Interpretation of seeing pears according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing pears in a dream means many benefits and benefits if they are in the same season. Dreaming of seeing pears in a dream Al-Nabulsi scholars explained that eating pears out of season is illness and weakness after recovery. Seeing green pears in a dream means meeting a person who has been missing for a long time. Interpretation of dreams: Seeing pears in a dream means wealth, fortune and a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about pears for a single woman: Dreaming about seeing pears in a dream, an unmarried woman saw that she was eating pears, this indicates that she will marry a rich man and be happy with him. Seeing pears in a dream She is an unmarried girl, it means good luck, hearing good news, and a wonderful future. If a woman sees pears in her dream, she can see that she will succeed in everything she wants and desires and will achieve many achievements in life. Dream of seeing pears in a dream If you see a girl peeling pears in Her dreams, it means that she is stealing money from her inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about pears for a married woman: For a married woman to see pears in her dreams, this means that she will get money, whether it is for work or inheritance. Dream of seeing pears in a dream Dreams of pears for a married woman, if If she was sick, she will recover and enjoy good health. The dream interpretation of seeing a pear in a married woman’s dream may indicate that the mother
